snippet: The paintings by former President George W. Bush mostly confirm the version of Mr. Bush we are familiar with: a man who is seemingly open and charming but also closed and opaque.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews exhibit of paintings by former Pres George W Bush at the George W Bush Presidential Center in Dallas.
lead_paragraph: The paintings by former President George W. Bush mostly confirm the version of Mr. Bush we are familiar with: a man who is seemingly open and charming but also closed and opaque.

headline.seo: George W. Bush’s Art Exhibition at Presidential Center
headline.main: The Faces of Power, From the Portraitist in Chief
headline.print_headline: The Faces of Power, From the Portraitist in Chief
